name: As I Look In the Mirror I See You / Louse#1
description:
Part of the project 'As I Look In The Mirror I See You', Sound by Edison Francis.

This render was 3D printed, cast and exhibited in the physical versions of the project

Often exploring ideas through the perspective of the machine mind, Kendricks' work invites the viewer into a world built by a speculative newly sentient digital entity. The work reflects on the nature of the network exploring the idea of copies and the contortion, collation and regurgitation of our own thoughts which, in current deep learning networks, display as convincing reflection of our own consciousness. 


Project collaborators:
Tom Johnsonart 
Garry Edison Cook
